metadata.title: CVE-2021-31808 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.15 and 5.x before 5.0.6. Due toan input-validation bug, it is vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack(against all clients using the proxy). A client sends an HTTP Range requestto trigger this.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-31808` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 4.13-10ubuntu1
squid-cgi - 4.13-10ubuntu1
squid-common - 4.13-10ubuntu1
squid-openssl - 4.13-10ubuntu1
squid-purge - 4.13-10ubuntu1
squidclient - 4.13-10ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.13-10ubuntu1').
